title: 820-00840 no video but backlight present
message:
There are no signs of spillage on the board. I have tried reseating the video cable. The board draws 20v at 640ma. I dumped the bios but meinject tool says theres no me region or me region is corrupt. It make a sound when you plug it in and using a Chipmunk it flashes usb activity. Cpu Also gets hot. Where is the best place to start?.

[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ugKI0CJmnJ-xhNDMRrhAatSjJ_uzHFGl/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

title: 820-00840 no video but backlight present
message: Hi thanks for your help but unfortunately its still the same. When charger is plugged in the macbook chimes and backlight comes on. Keyboard caps lock lights up cpu heats and fan spins.

title: 820-00840 no video but backlight present
message:
What about external video?
Try known good LCD assembly too.

title: 820-00840 no video but backlight present
message: Was a bad lcd, many thanks for your input.
